Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Peptides Incorporating Halogenated Marine-Derived Amino Acid Substituents.
Literature.Author: Craig AJ, Ermolovich Y, Cameron AJ, Rodler A, Wang H, Hawkes JA, Hubert M, Björkling F, Molchanova N, Brimble MA, Moodie LWK, Svenson J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=4µM),Candida albicans SC5314(MIC=4µM),Candida utilis(MIC=4µM),Aspergillus fumigatus(MIC=16µM)
